snippet: Nassau County prosecutors are also looking into whether teachers helped students in Glen Cove.
abstract: Nassau County district attorney Kathleen M Rice is looking into accusations that teachers in two elementary schools in Glen Cove, NY, improperly helped students with standardized tests during the 2011-2012 academic year.
lead_paragraph: Nassau County prosecutors are also looking into whether teachers helped students in Glen Cove.

headline.seo: Glen Cove Students Face Scrutiny After Coaching Accusations
headline.main: More Test-Taking Scrutiny at L.I. District After Coaching Accusations
headline.print_headline: More Test-Taking Scrutiny at L.I. District After Coaching Accusations
